forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 63F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. High 56F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 65F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
